statements: SELECT * FROM stock_levels ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, last_stock_update FROM stock_levels WHERE last_stock_update >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity, last_stock_update FROM stock_levels ORDER BY last_stock_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity < 50 AND product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, MAX(stock_quantity) AS max_quantity FROM stock_levels GROUP BY product_name HAVING max_quantity > 200;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM stock_levels GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, YEAR(last_stock_update) AS stock_year FROM stock_levels WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY stock_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity FROM stock_levels ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, supplier_id FROM inventory_data WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_id FROM inventory_data WHERE in_stock = true ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity <= 50 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC, last_updated ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_id, in_stock FROM inventory_data WHERE supplier_id = 500 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_id, quantity_available, expiration_date FROM inventory_data WHERE expiration_date >= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT supplier_id, delivery_date, quantity_delivered FROM supply_chain ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 100
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity FROM stock_levels ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE expiration_date > '2023-03-01' ORDER BY quantity_available DESC
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, delivery_date FROM supply_chain WHERE quantity_delivered <= 50
SELECT * FROM StockLevels;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM StockLevels ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location, quantity FROM StockLevels WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM InventoryData WHERE purchase_price < 50.0;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM StockLevels WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM StockLevels WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM InventoryData WHERE available_quantity < 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT id, vendor_id, purchase_price FROM InventoryData WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, status FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM StockLevels;
SELECT product_id, stock_level FROM StockLevels WHERE stock_level > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date, delivery_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM StockLevels;
SELECT product_id, stock_level, last_updated FROM StockLevels WHERE stock_level > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, phone_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE location IN ('Warehouse A', 'Warehouse B') AND quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
